mapper.select: SELECT m.id AS id, m.father_id AS fatherId, m.tree_node_type AS treeNodeType, m.order_num AS orderNum, m.menu_path AS menuPath, m.menu_name AS menuName, m.menu_code AS menuCode, m.menu_icon AS menuIcon, m.is_visible AS isVisible, m.is_new_window AS isNewWindow, m.remark AS remark FROM system_menu m LEFT JOIN role_menu rm ON rm.menu_id = m.id LEFT JOIN user_role_relation ur ON ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN system_user u ON u.id = ur.user_id WHERE u.id = #{userId} ORDER BY m.order_num ASC

SELECT m.id AS id, m.father_id AS fatherId, m.tree_node_type AS treeNodeType, m.order_num AS orderNum, m.menu_path AS menuPath, m.menu_name AS menuName, m.menu_code AS menuCode, m.menu_icon AS menuIcon, m.is_visible AS isVisible, m.is_new_window AS isNewWindow, m.remark AS remark, f.id AS favoriteId FROM tb_my_favorites f LEFT JOIN system_menu m on f.menu_id = m.id WHERE user_id = #{userId} and f.click_count > 0 ORDER BY f.click_count DESC LIMIT 7

SELECT m.id AS id, m.father_id AS fatherId, m.tree_node_type AS treeNodeType, m.order_num AS orderNum, m.menu_path AS menuPath, m.menu_name AS menuName, m.menu_code AS menuCode, m.menu_icon AS menuIcon, m.is_visible AS isVisible, m.is_new_window AS isNewWindow, m.remark AS remark, f.id AS favoriteId FROM tb_my_favorites f LEFT JOIN system_menu m on f.menu_id = m.id WHERE user_id = #{userId} and f.is_favorite = 1 ORDER BY f.click_count DESC
